summary: The diff does not show the requested principal ID being added to the platform-admin allowlist; the backend changes shown only reference AccessControl.isAdmin without any visible update to the allowlist contents.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the Internet Identity Principal ID "7sopg-rkdvi-vg7tv-4foks-ejhyr-rotwu-wcdxm-kkij6-zwzel-qownx-aae" to the backend platform-admin allowlist so this principal is recognized as a Platform Admin (isPlatformAdmin = true).
missing_requirements.reason: In the provided/truncated backend diff, there is no evidence of this principal being inserted into the admin allowlist or any initialization/migration logic that adds it; only a call to `AccessControl.isAdmin(accessControlState, caller)` is shown.
